cx-desc: Maks it easy tae [[Special:ContentTranslation|pit ower]] content pages
cx-special-login-error: Ye maun be loggit in fur tae owerset in this page. [$1 Log in]
cx-tools-instructions-text2: {{GENDER:|Ye}} dinna need tae eik thaim aw
cx-tools-instructions-text4: Machine owersetin is uisefu but {{GENDER:|ye'l}} need tae clean up some mistaks tae mak it juIst richt.
cx-tools-instructions-text6: Whan {{GENDER:|ye}}'r happie wi the ootcome, press "{{int:cx-publish-button}}".
cx-contributions-upload-tooltip: Uplaid picturs, audio an video tae uise in pages
cx-publishing-dialog-sub-title: Yer owersettin will scrieve ower the existin page. Please, tak tent that it is okay tae replace the existin content.
cx-notification-continue-translation: Ye stertit owersettin $1 some month syne. Consider furthsettin it afore it gets automatically thrawn oot efter ae year
cx-notification-continue-translation-bun: Ye stertit {{PLURAL:$1|$1 owersettins}} some month syne. Consider furthsettin thaim afore thay'r automatically thrawn oot efter ae year.
